# DSSvgUpload Usage

`DSSvgUpload` is a specialized version of the [DSUpload](./DSUploadUsage.md) component, optimized for handling SVG icon uploads. It features a specific horizontal layout with a 60x60 preview box and a dropzone.

## Basic Usage

```html
<div class="ds-svg-upload" 
     data-upload-url="/api/upload/icon" 
     data-name="icon">
    <!-- UI elements are automatically generated by the component -->
</div>

<script>
    import { DSSvgUpload } from '@doyosi/laraisy';
    
    // Manual initialization
    const uploader = new DSSvgUpload('.ds-svg-upload');
</script>
```

## Features

- **Strict SVG Support**: Automatically sets `accept` to `.svg,image/svg+xml`.
- **Specialized Layout**: 
    - Left: 60x60px Preview Box (shows SVG preview or placeholder icon).
    - Right: Interactive Dropzone with "Upload SVG Icon" text.
- **Smart State Management**: Handles "Browse", "File Info", "Progress", and "Error" states within the compact layout.

## Configuration

`DSSvgUpload` inherits all configuration from `DSUpload`, with some overrides and additions:

### Defaults Overrides
- `accept`: `'.svg,image/svg+xml'`
- `preview`: `true`
- `dropzoneText`: `'Upload SVG Icon'`

### Visual Customization (Defaults)
- `wrapperClass`: `'w-full'` (Container width)
- `iconBoxClass`: `'bg-base-200 border border-base-300'` (Style for the 60x60 preview box)

## Methods

Has the same methods as `DSUpload`, but overrides:
- `_buildDOM()`: Generates the specialized horizontal structure.
- `_showPreview(url, file)`: detailed logic for updating the 60x60 preview box and toggling between the dropzone and file info view.
